original_text: They will be punished with everlasting destruction and shut out from the presence of the Lord and from the glory of his might
korean_text: 이런 자들은 주의 얼굴과 그의 힘의 영광을 떠나 영원한 멸망의 형벌을 받으리로다

sentences.original_text: They will be punished with everlasting destruction
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 영원한 파멸로 벌을 받을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and shut out from the presence of the Lord
and from the glory of his might
